description: Manage the metadata for directory in file system.

commands.name: az storage fs directory metadata show
commands.summary: Return all user-defined metadata for the specified directory.
commands.syntax:
az storage fs directory metadata show --file-system
                                      --name
                                      [--account-key]
                                      [--account-name]
                                      [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                      [--blob-endpoint]
                                      [--connection-string]
                                      [--sas-token]
                                      [--timeout]
examples: az storage fs directory metadata show -n dir -f myfilesystem --account-name myadlsaccount --account-key 0000-0000

commands.name: az storage fs directory metadata update
commands.summary: Sets one or more user-defined name-value pairs for the specified file system.
commands.syntax:
az storage fs directory metadata update --file-system
                                        --metadata
                                        --name
                                        [--account-key]
                                        [--account-name]
                                        [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                        [--blob-endpoint]
                                        [--connection-string]
                                        [--sas-token]
                                        [--timeout]
